DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim non interventional study assess independent prognostic role overall survival primary tumour 18F-FDG uptake value ( SUVmax ) measure 18fluorodeoxyglucose positron emission tomography ( 18F-FDG-PET ) patient non-metastatic non-small cell lung cancer treat curative intent , take account conventional prognostic factor ( performance status , age , sex , disease stage ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prognostic Role Primary Non Small Cell Lung Carcinoma Standardized F18-FDG Uptake Values ( SUV TLG ) Measured With F18-fluorodeoxyglucose Positron Emission Tomography ( F18-FDG-PET ) : Non Interventional Study .
DOC.criteria: Pathologically demonstrate NSCLC Stage IIII treat curative treatment surgery without chemotherapy ( induction adjuvant ) chemoradiotherapy Inoperable patient treat exclusive radiotherapy A wholebody ( skull base mid thigh ) FDGPET combine FDGPET/CT dedicated machine , perform anticancer treatment FDGPET combine FDGPET/CT previously standardise accord procedure describe appendix IV Written inform consent Accessibility followup Age > 18 year Prior anticancer treatment ( surgery , radiotherapy chemotherapy ) Stage IV NSCLC A history prior malignant tumour , except nonmelanoma skin cancer situ carcinoma cervix cure malignant tumour ( 5year disease free interval ) Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( fast glycaemia 130 mg/dl ) Pregnancy lactate woman Unavailability send copy PET PETCT ( DICOM format ) data centre
